give.title: The Alchemist
give.author: Paulo Coelho
give.description: A philosophical novel about a young shepherd’s journey to discover his personal legend and follow his dreams.

give.title: Atomic Habits
give.author: James Clear
give.description: A practical guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones through tiny daily changes.

give.title: Wings of Fire
give.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam
give.description: An autobiography of India’s former President and a tribute to hard work, dreams, and determination.
